p: The lipids were extracted by the Soxhlet’s method [ 41] with some modifications. Each pre-dried sample was ground and weighed (0.5 g). After this, the samples were inserted in cellulose cartridges that were later placed in contact with hexane (P.A.) in the Soxhlet apparatus, and maintained under boiling conditions for 2 h. The lipid content of the sample was determined gravimetrically after the total evaporation of the solvent in an oven with air circulation at 105 °C. The analyses were carried out in triplicate.
